summary: WithWorkflowArgs type was removed from @temporalio/common and is not exported from @temporalio/client, breaking code that relies on this type for strong typing in SignalWithStart client calls.
userImpact: Users cannot import WithWorkflowArgs from expected packages, forcing them to use internal imports as a workaround.
rootCause: Type was removed from public API exports during refactoring without proper re-export or migration path
proposedFix: Re-export WithWorkflowArgs from @temporalio/client as suggested in CHANGELOG instructions
resolutionDetails: Type was re-exported from the appropriate public package
keyQuote: This type used to be exported under @temporalio/common, but no longer is. It's also not available in @temporalio/client
